meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Rick Sinclair Bruce Rhodewalt Matt Hubbard Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #160.

td.p: Rick Sinclair, an attorney from Los Angeles, California
Bruce Rhodewalt, a musician from Los Angeles, California
Matt Hubbard, a computer game designer from Palo Alto, California (whose 3-day cash winnings total $25,550)

tr.td: WORD PLAY
CANADA
MOVIE TRIVIA
OLD TESTAMENT
ODD WORDS
